Java Back-end Developer - VENA SOLUTIONS - TORONTO, CA

Who are we? Check out what our product team is up to at: https://engineering.vena.io Apply at: http://bit.ly/1V544wW

As our Java Back-end Developer, you will be responsible for building the backbone for the Vena platform, building REST web services with a very modern Java 8 backend stack.

We are seeking innovative, analytical software engineers with an aptitude for big data, machine learning and server-side development who love to be continually challenged to create scalable and performant code. You will work with a team of passionate, talented software engineers who love solving hard problems to build highly scalable web services, real-time systems, resilient services and so much more.
